body_html:
@mbz There are some guidelines on how to deal with memory leaks in TensorFlow here:

http://stackoverflow.com/documentation/tensorflow/3883/how-to-debug-a-memory-leak-in-tensorflow#t=201612281727521481272

In particular, you should try running with tcmalloc, which can prevent heap fragmentation (that sometimes leads to out-of-memory errors with the default malloc() implementation).
